name: zenbhang
body:
![Benjamin Zhang](http://i.imgur.com/Sfaoxsq.jpg)

# Who Am I?

I am a student at the **University of Minnesota** enrolled in the **Computer Science BA** program. 

For the 2015-2016 academic year, I am the acting **Vice-Chair** of **IEEE** (Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers).

I have programmed several popular Rainmeter skins, most notably, a revision of the **Monstercat Player** as well as the self-dubbed **Zen Bar**, detailed below.

I am also currently curating the AlfredProject, a project that I started early in high school. 

# Languages I Work In
C#, C++, Assembly (x86, y86), Java, VB.Net, Python, Ocaml

#Contact Links
**Email** : zhan2736@umn.edu

**[Reddit](http://www.reddit.com/user/zenbhang)**

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Zenbhang)**

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Zenbhang)**

#Relevant Classwork
**CSCI 1133** - Introduction to Programming

**CSCI 1933** - Introduction to Algorithms and Data Structures

**CSCI 2011** - Discrete Structures of Computer Science

**CSCI 2021** - Machine Architecture and Organization

**CSCI 2033** - Elementary Computational Linear Algebra

# Projects
## Alfred Project
  An old AI project that I developed early in high school to try and compete with Siri (a lone competitor in the market at the time). Source Code [here](http://zenbhang.github.io/alfredproject).

## Rainmeter Related Work
  I made a custom skin based on the **Monstercat Player** by **i077**. It garnered notable attention on **[Reddit](http://www.reddit.com/r/Rainmeter/comments/2eqmyi/saw_the_monstercat_media_player_and_made_a/)** and on **[Deviantart](http://zenbhang.deviantart.com/art/Monstercat-Player-Zenbhang-Edition-1-0-478492311)**.

  Source for the Monstercat Player found [here](https://github.com/zenbhang/Monstercat-Player--Zenbhang-Edition-).

  I also created a UI bar similar to the above concept, that was featured in many Rainmeter communities found [here](http://zenbhang.deviantart.com/art/The-Zen-Bar-1-1-350710793). 

  As of **6/11/2015**, the day I made this .io page, **22,779** users have viewed the skins, and **4,649** users have downloaded and use the skin. More can be found [here](http://zenbhang.deviantart.com/).
 
  **Rainmeter** is a GUI skinning tool that allows users to put overlays on their desktop. More info at: http://rainmeter.net/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
